verbs.description: < p > WASHINGTON , June 2 ( Reuters ) - [ARG0: An attorney of U.S. President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: that if the special counsel investigating Russia 's alleged meddling in the 2016 U.S. election were to subpoena the president , it would set off a legal battle] , [ARGM-ADV: according to an ABC News report on Saturday.</p] >

< p > WASHINGTON , June 2 ( Reuters ) - An attorney of U.S. President Donald Trump said that if [ARG0: the special counsel] [V: investigating] [ARG1: Russia 's alleged meddling in the 2016 U.S. election] were to subpoena the president , it would set off a legal battle , according to an ABC News report on Saturday.</p >

< p > WASHINGTON , June 2 ( Reuters ) - An attorney of U.S. President Donald Trump said that if the special counsel investigating Russia 's [V: alleged] meddling in the 2016 U.S. election were to subpoena the president , it would set off a legal battle , according to an ABC News report on Saturday.</p >
